## CommonBuilderKit

<GenerationInfo sourceFile="packages/commandkit/src/components/interactive/select-menu/SelectMenu.ts" sourceLine="56" packageName="commandkit" />

Type for the common builder kit that can be used with select menus.

```ts title="Signature"
type CommonBuilderKit = | StringSelectMenuKit
  | UserSelectMenuKit

  | MentionableSelectMenuKit
```
